OOC: I didn't even read the post throughly, but I can
tell it's great.  Oh and I'm going to take a wild
swing and say it's Zardus (even though he was
originally Yans char, after the restart everyone lost
there chars so if someone wanted to bring back a good
one noone would complain).

--- hugar_twriker <hugar_twriker@...> wrote:
>    A ship slowly floats through the depth of space. 
> The ship is 
> about the size of two cars.  It has a slight
> white/gray tint to it 
> with black windows.  It slowly moves towards the
> third planet from 
> the sun.  The planet is mostly Blue with a couple
> masses of green.  
> The ship starts to shake as it enters the
> atmosphere.  
> 
>    Inside the ship sits one bot behind the controls
> of the ship.  The 
> bot can not be reconized because there is a shadow
> over him.  The 
> shaking get even worse as the bot's right arm
> quickly reaches over to 
> the right as his yellow with black dotted arm flicks
> a switch.
> 
>    The ship doesn't stop shaking as it gets closer
> and closer to 
> earth.  All of a sudden the engine blows as flames
> are thrown from 
> the back of the ship.  The bot in the inside of the
> ship starts to 
> punch the button he just touched.  A firey streak
> can be seen in the 
> sky as the ship crash lands About 155 miles south of
> the maximal base.
> 
> OOC: Sorry if it sucks first post in the past may
> months also with no 
> created jucies flowing.
> 
>
